Dialogs.DialogContent: Where is this for me?
Young man, this is a paradise for adventurers. Welcome to Yasland Underground castle ..
What, what ... who are you?
I'm Luo Priest, a prophet of the land of Yaslan. Hehe, when you speak Before you ask more questions, let's get rid of the immediate trouble.
Do you mean Goblin? They are just black and white.
Australia, it seems you are full of confidence. So let's get familiar with the basic operations first Go ahead.
Hello, I'm Alice.
You try the most basic operation first.
Please touch the joystick on the left side of the screen and move it back and forth
Be careful of the enemy in front, click the virtual button on the right to attack it
Okay, the most basic operation of the game, I will introduce this first.
Hero! This is the underground castle area of ​​the Yasland continent, how did you come here? ?
Since the Big Bang, my ancestors have ordered me to find the source of the disaster OscarWarcraft and eradicated it.
You are too arrogant, how can you do it with your own strength, you Hurry back.
Is the priest Luo asking you to say this?
Okay, since I can't convince you, please do it yourself. But I advise you Don't go to the core area of ​​the underground castle in Yaslan mainland, you will die a lifetime!
Thanks, but I will still go!
Heroes: I heard you went to the core area of ​​the underground castle in the land of Yasland
The prophet Jialuo had expected this, and ordered me to wait for you Three treasures!
What a treasure, thank you in advance
Thanks to the Prophet Luo Priest. Please open your backpack and equip this Three treasures.
Okay, thanks in advance!
Hello, this is a test statement !!!
